subject: PLUS X or PRO X ?
description_text:
Hello,

Can you tell me the difference between the PLUS X pedals and PRO X ???

What is the latest ???

I know that PRO X has the adjustable dumper... any other important
differences?

Thank you very much
-- 
David García Ros
dgros@consulta-m.com

conversations.body_text: Hi David García Ros,     The main difference between ProX and ProX Ultra lies in motor support and functionality:    ProX Ultra supports VAM Pro motors, allowing bidirectional movement.    ProX only supports unidirectional motor movement.    As for PlusX, ProX, and Ultra, they all share the following features:    16-bit high-resolution precision for accurate control;    RGB telemetry lighting for real-time status display;    8-level hydraulic fine-tuning to meet different preferences.    If you don’t have high requirements for lighting, PlusX is also a great choice. No matter which model you choose, these pedals will deliver an excellent experience.
